title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the factors to be analyzed, desired outputs, target users, and performance expectations.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data pipeline, machine learning models, user interface components, and infrastructure setup. Prioritize factors like data storage, processing, model training, deployment, monitoring, scalability, maintainability, modularity, performance, and security. Propose solutions for handling sensitive employee data in accordance with privacy regulations. Provide a detailed design document outlining the proposed system architecture, emphasizing the importance of testing and documentation. Include considerations for future updates and improvements. Also, suggest potential tools or libraries that could be used for each component. Once the draft is ready, share it with team members for discussion and feedback.

title: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline
description: Implement the data ingestion and processing pipeline to collect and prepare the relevant employee data for analysis.

title: Build Machine Learning Models
description: Develop and train machine learning models to analyze the employee data and predict engagement levels.

title: Create User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the tool, including data visualization and interaction components.

title: Integrate System Components
description: Integrate the data pipeline, machine learning models, and user interface into a cohesive system.
dependencies: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Ensure the system has proper security measures and access controls to protect sensitive employee data.

title: Test and Validate System
description: Conduct thorough testing of the system, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Deploy the system to a production environment and implement monitoring and logging mechanisms.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides to support the deployment and usage of the tool.
